00023 /* FIFO queue */
00024 
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <stdlib.h>
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 
00029 #include "bus_rx_queue.h"
00030 #include "bus.h"
00031 
00032 #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00033         #include "../front_panel/led_control.h"
00034         #include "../front_panel/event_handler.h"
00035         #include "../front_panel/errors.h"
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 
00040 unsigned char bus_rx_queue_size;
00041 
00043 rx_queue_struct rx_queue;
00044 
00046 void rx_queue_init(void) {
00047         rx_queue.first = 0;
00048         rx_queue.last = 0;
00049         bus_rx_queue_size = 0;
00050 }
00051 
00055 void rx_queue_add(BUS_MESSAGE message) {
00056         bus_rx_queue_size++;
00057 
00058         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00059                 if (bus_rx_queue_size > BUS_RX_QUEUE_SIZE) {
00060                         led_set_error(LED_STATE_ON);
00061                         
00062                         //Set the error flag
00063                         event_set_error(ERROR_TYPE_BUS_RX_QUEUE_FULL,1);
00064 
00065                 }       
00066         #endif
00067 
00068         
00069         rx_queue.message[rx_queue.last++] = message;
00070         
00071         if (rx_queue.last >= BUS_RX_QUEUE_SIZE)
00072                 rx_queue.last = 0;
00073         
00074         if (rx_queue.last == rx_queue.first)
00075                 rx_queue.first++;
00076         
00077         if (rx_queue.first >= BUS_RX_QUEUE_SIZE)
00078                 rx_queue.first = 0;     
00079 }
00080 
00084 BUS_MESSAGE rx_queue_get() {
00085         //Return the message (content of the first node)
00086         return(rx_queue.message[rx_queue.first]);
00087 }
00088 
00091 void rx_queue_drop(void) {
00092         rx_queue.first++;
00093         
00094         bus_rx_queue_size--;
00095         
00096         if (rx_queue.first >= BUS_RX_QUEUE_SIZE)
00097                 rx_queue.first = 0;
00098 }
00099 
00103 void rx_queue_dropall(void) {
00104         rx_queue.first = 0;
00105         rx_queue.last = 0;
00106         
00107         bus_rx_queue_size = 0;
00108 }
00109 
00112 unsigned char rx_queue_is_empty(void) {
00113         if (rx_queue.first == rx_queue.last)
00114                 return(1);
00115         else
00116                 return(0);
00117 }
00118 
00121 unsigned char rx_queue_size(void) {
00122         return(bus_rx_queue_size);
00123 }
